credentials.title: Credentials
credentials.nocred:
You have no saved credentials.
Add one to start using the Wallet.
credentials.expiredText: This credential has expired and you can no longer use it.
credentials.confirmationMessage: Do you want to choose this credential?

home.title: Home

ebsi-popup.info: In order to fulfill the prerequisites of EBSI credential issue, copy this DID and Credential Offer Endpoint.

home.error-ebsi: The did could not be returned.

mailto_permission_alert: Please ensure that you have the necessary permissions to send emails using your default mail application. If the mail service does not open, it is likely due to permission restrictions.

vc-selector.title: Vc Selector
vc-selector.server-error-message:
We couldn't process your request.
Please try again later.

vc-view.warning-msg: By generating this code, you agree that the data contained in your permit, and its legal status, will be displayed on the reader device to verify its validity.
vc-view.delete-header: Are you sure to delete this credential?
vc-view.delete-message: If you delete the credential from the app and need to recover it, you will need to request a new one.

errors.default: Unexpected error. If the problem persists, contact the support team.
errors.failed-qr-process:
We couldn't process the QR code.
It might be invalid or already used. Please refresh the credential offer. If the problem persists, report it to the support team.
errors.invalid-qr: The presented QR code is not valid
errors.no-credentials-available: There are no credentials available to login
errors.expired-credentialOffer: The credential offer is expired or already used. Please refresh and try again later, or contact your company's LEAR to get a new credential.
errors.cannot-get-VC: Issuer credential could not be obtained
errors.cannot-save-VC: The credential could not be saved successfully
errors.incorrect-pin: Incorrect PIN. Please refresh the credential offer. If the problem persists, report it to the support team.
errors.pin-expired: You didn't enter the PIN within the time limit. Please refresh the credential offer. If the problem persists, report it to the support team.
errors.unsigned: The signed credential is not yet available
errors.no-connection: Connection was lost. Please check your network and try again.
errors.navigation: There was an unexpected problem when trying to access the page. If the problem persists, report it to the support team.

camera.not-readable: The camera cannot be accessed. Make sure no other application is using it. You may need to refresh the page.
camera.not-allowed: Camera access is denied. Check your browser permissions. If the issue persists, try refreshing the page.
camera.not-found: Camera not found on this device. Make sure it is properly connected and refresh the page.
camera.overconstrained: The camera configuration is not compatible. Try selecting a different camera or refreshing the page.
camera.security: Camera access is blocked due to security restrictions. You may need to refresh the page or check your browser settings.
camera.abort: Camera access was aborted. Check your browser permissions and make sure no other application is using the camera. Try again or refresh the page.
camera.type: Configuration error: the camera request is invalid. Try refreshing the page or checking your camera settings
camera.not-supported: Your browser does not support camera access. Consider using a different browser.
camera.default: Unexpected error. Check your browser permissions and make sure no other application is using the camera. Try refreshing the page.
